column1: Foamy vanilla sauce with soy milk.

1. Pour soy milk into mixing cup.
 1. Weigh dry ingredients on a jeweller’S scale.
 1. Drop it into the milk and be on top of it *immediately* with an immersion blender on full.
 1. Blend until everything is dissolved and smooth, wait ~3 minutes, and mix it to a foamy consistency.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.
Salty Stability [Inulin / GMS / CMC / Guar / XG / Salt]
